Name: Goals
Formula: Count of events where event_type = 'shot' AND event_detail_1 = 'goal' AND player is event_player_1
FilterContext: Filter by game_id and player_id for player-game; sum over games for season
Notes: Only credit shooter (event_player_1); own-goals handled as goals for scoring team.

Name: Primary Assists
Formula: Count of goal events where play_details_1 = 'primary_assist' AND player is event_player_1
Inputs: fact_events_long: event_type, event_detail_1, play_details_1, event_player_1_id, game_id
FilterContext: Same game and player filters as goals.
Notes: Assumes tracking sheet encodes primary assist explicitly in play_details_1.

Name: Secondary Assists
Formula: Count of goal events where play_details_2 = 'secondary_assist' AND player is event_player_1
Inputs: fact_events_long: event_type, event_detail_1, play_details_2, event_player_1_id, game_id
Notes: If league scoring uses different fields, adjust mapping.

Name: Points
FilterContext: Same context as goals and assists.
Notes: Can be computed in SQL or as a DAX measure; conceptually simple sum.

Name: Shots on Goal (SOG)
Formula: Count of shot events with event_detail_1 in ('shot_on_goal','goal') where player is event_player_1
FilterContext: Filter on shooter and game; team aggregation by team_id.
Notes: Separates SOG from misses and blocks; used in SH%.

Name: Shot Attempts (Corsi)
Formula: Count of events with event_type IN ('shot','goal') for any on-ice player (from shifts) regardless of block/miss/goal
Inputs: fact_events_long, fact_shifts_long: event_type, team_id, on_ice_player_ids, game_id
FilterContext: Corsi For: events where on-ice team = shooting team; Against: shooting team is opponent.
Notes: Requires joining events to on-ice players via shift_index or time.

Name: Unblocked Attempts (Fenwick)
Formula: Like Corsi but excluding blocked_shot event_detail_1 values
Inputs: fact_events_long, fact_shifts_long: event_type, event_detail_1, team_id, on_ice_player_ids, game_id
FilterContext: Same as Corsi but filter out blocks.
Notes: Used as better proxy for shot quality than Corsi in some models.

Name: Plus-Minus
Formula: Goals For while on ice at even-strength minus Goals Against while on ice at even-strength
FilterContext: Only even-strength or configurable strength states.
Notes: Can exclude EN or PP/PK situations depending on philosophy.

Name: Time on Ice (TOI, seconds)
Formula: Sum(shift_end_time - shift_start_time) per player, optionally minus stoppage_time
Inputs: fact_shifts_long: player_id, game_id, period, shift_start_running, shift_end_running, stoppage_time
FilterContext: Per game, per period, or aggregated across games.
Notes: You can track raw TOI and stoppage-adjusted TOI as separate stats.

Name: Controlled Zone Entries
Formula: Count of events where event_type = 'zone_entry' AND event_detail_1 = 'controlled' AND player is event_player_1
Inputs: fact_events_long: event_type, event_detail_1, event_player_1_id, zone, game_id
Notes: Can split carry-in vs pass-in using play_details_*.

Name: Controlled Zone Exits
Formula: Count of events where event_type = 'zone_exit' AND event_detail_1 = 'controlled' AND player is event_player_1
Inputs: fact_events_long: event_type, event_detail_1, event_player_1_id, zone, game_id
Notes: Pair with failed exits to get success rates.

Name: Giveaways (Clean)
Formula: Count of events tagged as turnover/giveaway that are NOT dumps/clears and NOT shot misses
Inputs: fact_events_long: event_type, event_detail_1, play_details_1/2, event_successful, event_player_1_id
FilterContext: Filter by event tags and exclude cleared categories.
Notes: Matches your requirement to isolate 'true' misplays from tactical dumps/clears.

Name: Takeaways / Forced Turnovers
Formula: Count of events where a defensive action directly causes a loss of possession, credited to event_player_1
FilterContext: Event taxonomy should distinguish forced vs unforced giveaways.
Notes: You may refine using chain/sequence context.

Name: Rating-Adjusted Corsi For per 60
Notes: Opp_onIce_rating_avg can come from your rating context tables.

Name: Sequence xG Contribution
Formula: Sum of xG for all shots in sequences where player appears as a key event actor, divided by #sequences
FilterContext: Filter sequences by team or game as needed.
Notes: Requires you to compute/ingest xG and sequence tables.

Name: Rush Chances
Formula: Count of shots/goals within N seconds of controlled OZ entry by same team/line
Notes: Key concept for modern xThreat style models.
